special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell.
descriptions: The jackal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
descriptions: The jackal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.
